bbmm.promptNewPresetName: Enter a name for the new preset
bbmm.descImportIssues: The imported preset was saved, but the following issues were found
bbmm.promptWhatImport: What would you like to import
bbmm.promptApplyModulePreset: Apply module preset {name} to this world
bbmm.promptReload: Settings preset applied. Reload now to ensure everything initializes correctly
bbmm.settingPresetExists: A settings preset named {name} already exists
bbmm.allSettingsMsg: All {count} settings in the file will be imported into the preset
bbmm.promptNameSettingsPreset: Enter a name for the new settings preset
bbmm.selectSettingsPreset: Select a settings preset to update
bbmm.selectSettingsPresetLoad: Select a settings preset to load
bbmm.skippedSettingsApply: Skipped {count} setting(s) for uninstalled or unregistered modules (see console)
bbmm.name_showChangelogsOnLogin: Show Changelog Report on GM Login
bbmm.hint_showChangelogsOnLogin: If enabled, the GM will be prompted with changelogs for any modules updated since they were last marked seen.
bbmm.hint_checkDisabledModules: When enabled, BBMM will also look for changelogs in installed but disabled modules.
bbmm.hintSelectUsersPushLock: If enabled, clicking the lock or sync icon will open a user picker. No changes are pushed until you click Save changes.
bbmm.dialogNoteCurrentSaved: Note: Pushes current saved value. Be sure to save the setting before Lock/Sync.
bbmm.infoQueuedLock: Queued lock for {module} ({count} users). Will apply on Save.
bbmm.infoQueuedSync: Queued sync for {module} ({count} users). Will apply on Save.
bbmm.infoQueuedUnlock: Queued unlock for {module}. Will apply on Save.
bbmm.includeHiddenWarnMsg: Saving and loading hidden settings could result in unexpected results. It is advised to use the Inclusions Manager to add specific hidden settings. Are you sure you wish to save/export hidden settings?
bbmm.controlsToggleHint: If enabled, the GM can lock or soft-lock keybindings and push them to connected players.
bbmm.controlsTtHard: Hard lock this keybinding for all users (apply exactly; users cannot change).
bbmm.controlsTtSoft: Soft lock this keybinding for all users (apply by default; users can change until GM bumps revision).
bbmm.controlsTtClear: Clear any lock or soft-lock for this keybinding.
bbmm.keybindColorScopesHint: If enabled: world keybinds are blue; client keybinds are orange; user keybinds remain default.
bbmm.enableModuleManagementHint: When enabled, BBMM replaces the stock Manage Modules list with the compact layout and notes UI for all users. Only a GM can change this.
bbmm.aboutHint: Open the About BBMM journal entry.
bbmm.aboutOpenMissing: About BBMM journal entry not found.
bbmm.aboutOpenError: Failed to open the About BBMM journal.
bbmm.v12Note:
This module offers minimal support for FoundryVTT v12, allowing you to export settings and module states as prep for updating to v13.
NOTE: Some settings may not transfer if the v13 module setting has changed.
bbmm.noteSaveBeforeLoad: Tip: Save your current settings before loading a different preset to avoid losing changes

errors.existsPrompt: What would you like to do
errors.notBBMMFile: Error! Not a BBMM export. Expected a file created by BBMM
errors.importWizFailedCon: Import Wizard failed during construction (see console)
errors.importWizFailRen: Import Wizard failed during render (see console)
errors.importWizFailOpen: Failed to open Import Wizard (see console)
errors.selectSettingPresetDelete: Select a settings preset to delete
errors.failedOpenLegacyExport: Failed to open legacy export dialog (See console)

changelog.dont_show_again: Auto-mark this page as read on close
changelog.remote_placeholder: Remote changelog cannot be loaded in-app. Use the Open File button to view it.
changelog.dontShowAgain: Don’t show again for this version

sync.ReloadMsg: You have new GM-enforced settings. A reload is required.
sync.ReloadWarn: Settings updated by GM. Please reload.
sync.EnableHint: GM: When disabled, BBMM will not add lock/sync controls, push values, or enforce/hide user/client settings.
sync.ClickPickUsers: Click: Select online users to sync

inclusions.title: Inclusions Manager
inclusions.noHidden: No hidden settings available to include
inclusions.inclusionsOpenError: Failed to open the Inclusions Manager.
inclusions.addModuleWarnMsg: It is not recommended to include an entire module unless you are sure the data it is saving will be safe. {docLink} Continue?
inclusions.menuHasNoHidden: That menu has no hidden settings to include.

_settings.userExclusions_hint: Modules or Settings to be ignored when importing/exporting BBMM presets.
_settings.userInclusions_hint: Hidden settings explicitly included when exporting BBMM settings presets.
_settings.seenChangelogs_hint: Internal map of changelogs marked as 'seen'.
_settings.softLockLedger_hint: Remembers which soft-lock value was last auto-applied per setting id
_settings.softLockRevMap_hint: Master list of soft lock values and revisions
_settings.userControlSync_hint: Master list of controls soft locks
_settings.softLockRevMap_controls_hint: Remembers which controls soft lock value was last applied
_settings.moduleLocksHint: Modules listed here are locked in BBMM and cannot be enabled or disabled (manually or via bulk actions).
_settings.autoForceReloadHint: Force instant reload to players when settings new settings are locked/synced

macro.failedCopyToClipboard: Clipboard copy failed. Select text and press Ctrl+C.
macro.noEntriesFound: No entries found or loading cancelled.
macro.failedOpenSettingsInspector: Failed to open Settings Inspector (see console).
macro.presetFilterPlaceholder: Search namespace, key, scope, visibility, value…
macro.presetMalformed: Preset is malformed or has no items.
macro.failedOpenPresetInspector: Failed to open Preset Inspector (see console).
macro.failedOpenKeybindInspector: Failed to open Keybinding Inspector (see console).
macro.keybindFilterPlaceholder: Search namespace, action, name, hint, keys…
macro.selectModuleToViewSettings: Select a module to view settings.

moduleManagement.depsPrompt: The module you enabled requires the following module(s). Enable them as well?
moduleManagement.disableDependentsPrompt: The module you are disabling is required by the following module(s). Disable them as well?
moduleManagement.disableOrphansPrompt: The module you are disabling has required module(s) that are no longer needed by anything else. Disable them too?
moduleManagement.reloadMessage: Module configuration was updated. Reload now to apply?
moduleManagement.reloadLaterNotice: BBMM: Changes saved. Reload to apply.
moduleManagement.saveFailed: BBMM: Failed to save module configuration.
moduleManagement.settingBtnToolTip: Opens BBMM Module Manager (Shift-click for core)
moduleManagement.lockBlocked: This module is locked and cannot be changed.
moduleManagement.disableDependentsPromptMulti: Disable the following modules that depend on this one? Uncheck any you want to keep enabled:
moduleManagement.disableOrphansPromptMulti: These modules are no longer required. Disable them as well? Uncheck any you want to keep enabled:
